articles.title: v1.15.0

articles.description: This vulnerability allows local attackers to disclose sensitive information on affected installations of Trend Micro Maximum Security. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
articles.title: ZDI-22-962: Trend Micro Maximum Security Out-Of-Bounds Read Information Disclosure Vulnerability

articles.description: This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of Linux Kernel. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute high-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
articles.title: ZDI-22-961: Linux Kernel LightNVM Subsystem Heap-based Overflow Privilege Escalation Vulnerability

articles.description: This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of Linux Kernel. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute high-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
articles.title: ZDI-22-960: Linux Kernel LightNVM Subsystem Heap-based Overflow Privilege Escalation Vulnerability

articles.description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to bypass authentication on affected installations of Vinchin Backup and Recovery. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
articles.title: ZDI-22-959: (0Day) Vinchin Backup and Recovery MySQL Server Use of Hard-coded Credentials Authentication Bypass Vulnerability

articles.description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of SAP 3D Visual Enterprise Viewer. User interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability in that the target must visit a malicious page or open a malicious file.
